user:

As a Registered Nurses with Ph.D., your work involves assess patient health problems and needs, develop and implement nursing care plans, and maintain medical records. administer nursing care to ill, injured, convalescent, or disabled patients. may advise patients on health maintenance and disease prevention or provide case management. licensing or registration required.
